roleset.name: Hesitant, disinclined to do something
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Comparison to hesitant-j.01.

example.name: All args
example.text: I 'd be reluctant to start messing with an elderly relative 's finances .
example.arg: to start messing with an elderly relative 's finances .
